text: Alfred Syson (6 April 1880 - 2 August 1952) was a British fencer. He competed in the individual sabre event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1952 deaths Category:British male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Great Britain Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Alfred Syson
